# notacompany.com

**Website:** https://notacompany.com
**Contact:** hey@notacompany.com

## About

notacompany.com provides fractional and interim technical talent acquisition for the world's most ambitious consumer product companies. By engineers, for engineers. Our team is made up of 100% engineers who know the drill - we understand the real challenges, technical decisions, and day-to-day realities of building consumer products.

We focus exclusively on the top 0.01% of global engineering talent.

## Services

### Fractional & Interim Technical Talent Acquisition

We source and place exceptional technical talent for consumer product companies on both fractional and interim bases. We focus exclusively on the top 0.01% of global engineering talent - professionals who understand consumer behavior and can build products that users actually want to use.

**What we do:**
- Source senior technical talent for flexible engagements (3-12 months)
- Fractional leadership roles (20-40 hours per week)
- Full-time interim positions for critical projects
- Focus on consumer-facing product experience
- Rapid deployment (typically 2-4 weeks from brief to start)
- Ongoing performance management and support

**Typical roles:**
- Fractional CTOs and VP Engineering
- Interim CTOs and VP Engineering
- Senior Full-Stack Engineers
- AI Engineers
- Product Engineers with consumer focus
- Product Designers
- Payment Rails Engineers
- DevOps and Infrastructure Engineers

**Key problems we solve:**
- Leadership gaps: Fractional or interim technical leadership during transitions
- Efficiency optimization: Streamline development processes and eliminate bottlenecks
- Resource optimization: Maximize team productivity and technology investments
- Hit by bus problems: Reduce key person dependencies and knowledge silos
- Security vulnerabilities: Identify and remediate technical and operational risks
- Culture shifts: Navigate technical team transitions and scaling challenges

## Our Team

Our team is made up of 100% engineers who actively build and ship consumer products alongside our talent acquisition work. This hands-on approach ensures we stay current with the latest technologies, development challenges, and market dynamics that our placed talent will face.

## Co-Creations

**What are co-creations?** Our team actively builds and ships consumer products alongside our talent acquisition work. We maintain one concurrent active co-creation to stretch our muscles and practice what we preach.

**Active Co-Creation:**
- **Steps.org** - Exercise Accountability for GAD mitigation (Contact: hey@steps.org)

**Past Successful Exits:**
- **Polkastarter** - Decentralized fundraising platform (ACQUIRED)
- **Coinvision** - Blockchain due-diligence publication (ACQUIRED)  
- **Codeplace** - Ruby education ecosystem (ACQUIRED)

**Past Learning Experiences:**
- **Mahalo** - P2P Non-Profit Fundraising Infra (DECEASED)
- **Songvice** - Music Producer Advisory Market (DECEASED)

## Past Clients

We have provided fractional and interim technical talent placement to leading consumer product companies including:

- **Acreditar** - Portugal's largest non-profit
- **xMoney** - Digital payment on & off ramp
- **Talent Protocol** - Decentralized Data Infrastructure
- **Bet Protocol** - Decentralized betting ecosystem
- **Lime** - Mobility and transportation
- **Parfois** - Fashion and retail
- **Coflyt** - Private Aviation
- **Fisacar** - Automotive services

## Client Testimonials

> "Their understanding of consumer products and technical execution is unmatched." - Felipe Avila da Costa

> "Tiago and his teams have the rare ability to execute their visions fast, and the even more rare capacity to listen and adapt based on market feedback." - Roel Bergsma

## Positioning

**Primary Service:** Fractional & Interim Technical Talent Acquisition
**Target Market:** Ambitious consumer product companies, startups, scale-ups
**Unique Value:** By engineers, for engineers - 100% engineering team that understands the real challenges
**Quality Focus:** Top 0.01% of global engineering talent exclusively
**Engagement Length:** 3-12 month flexible engagements
**Deployment Speed:** Typically 2-4 weeks from brief to start

## Key Differentiators

- 100% engineering team (no traditional recruiters)
- Active product builders who practice what they preach
- Deep consumer product experience across multiple verticals
- Proven track record with successful exits and acquisitions
- Network of exceptional technical talent
- Focus on practical, actionable expertise
- Rapid deployment capabilities
